article: Make your school life fun What do you think of your school life ? Someone said it was very  _  because you just have lessons all day. But let me tell you  _  we can make our school life full of fun . I am in school now but  _  me, I enjoy my schooldays a lot. There are lots of ways to help you stay happy at school. First, you should  _  a lot of friends. You can  _  your joy and sadness, enjoy your schooldays and do everything together with them. The most important is to get a  _  friend . So you can share even your secrets with him or her. Second, you'd better be  _  one of your school sports clubs. You can take part in different sports or matches . It doesn't matter who wins because playing  _  is fun. Sports will make your school life colourful. Third, you should  _  to do well in studies . Your marks will be an important factor . With good marks , you'll find it easier to be happy. I am sure if you do the  _  three things , you'll enjoy yourself very much at school. You'll love to go to school and maybe want to go to school even at the weekend.
